name: Long Way Home (Turtle Edition)
description:
Oh no!

This little menace is holding everyone back! The road won't open up again until he's safely across the street. 

...He sure is taking his time, though.

Surely there's something you can do to speed things up... Right?? 

Experience

Turtle is a 3D simulation game and a continuation of one of the levels created from the project: Long Way Home.
(Long Way Home by NotJoseph, MandoQueer, dch789, nikcy, lsy980715 (itch.io))

===

You find your journey home suddenly interrupted by an unexpected turtle crossing. You've been in traffic jams before, but it's nothing compared to this. You could swear that thing wasn't even moving, if it weren't for the crosswalk markings.

Everyone's gone off, and now the street is empty... What will you do? As things are, you won't be going anywhere, anytime soon... 

Controls
  •  W A S D - To move 
  • E - To Interact 
  • Esc - Pause menu
